name: Grid Tactics
description:
A template for a grid movement , grid tactics type game like ff tactics , click on the grid you want to move to and the pathfinder moves you there , this is insprired by final fantasy tactics type games

this is a grid tactics template , i have other templates so make sure to checkout my store

Your players movement points is shown at the top left of the screen

move the cursor where you want your player to move

when you have your desired location/position , click ok and your player will move to the location

this is like the old school games similar to final fantasy tactics  , i spent alot of time creating this template on Construct 2 , so if you are interested in game designing  make sure to give that program a try , i would also recommend using the updated newer and improved version Construct 3  ,  it has a futuristic game engine design called "visual scripting" allowing you to code easily with little or no knowledge on scripting , i as a game developer also make templates to help people that have dreams of one day making their very own dream game just like me possible. checkout my page for my other templates , thank you.
